# an adult man who lives with his parents, similar to Italian [[mammone]].
types.html:
Tanguy m (plural Tanguys)

  1. an adult man who lives with his parents, similar to Italian mammone.
trans: an adult man who lives with his parents, similar to Italian mammone.

title: Tanguy
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tɑ̃.ɡi/
